properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 11:57AM EST until February 8 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two
inch. Total snow accumulation of two to three inches possible.

* WHERE...Banks County.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow on area roadways, and
reduced visibility in snow, could make travel very difficult.
Temperatures should drop below freezing again tonight...making
black ice possible on Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
